(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA1-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Cloud liquid water")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Accuracy ?val4 Medium) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WEA1-1)
            (parameter "Cloud liquid water")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Boundary Layer Processes (W-1a)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-1* 1.0))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA1-1-attribdegraded-1    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Cloud liquid water")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Accuracy ?val4 Medium) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA1-1)
            (parameter "Cloud liquid water")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Boundary Layer Processes (W-1a)")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-1* 0.67))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA1-1-attribdegraded-4    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Cloud liquid water")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val4&~nil)

           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Lowest-100km-or-greater) 0))

    =>

            (parameter "Cloud liquid water")
            (value 0.2)

            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

)

                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)

                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val5 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA1-6)
            (parameter "Aerosol type")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Boundary Layer Processes (W-1a)")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA1-6* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-6* 0.33))
)

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA2-1)
            (parameter "Cloud liquid water")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Low-frequency Weather Variability (W-2a)")
            (attribute "Insufficient vertical spatial resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA2-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-1* 0.5))
)

            (Parameter "Deep convection vertical velocity")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val5&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))

    )

                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Highest-1h-orless) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WEA4-2)
            (parameter "Precipitation")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Vertical Motion within Deep Convection (W-4a)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA4-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA4-2* 1.0))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA6-1)
            (parameter "Aerosol optical depth")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Long-Term Air Pollution (W-6a)")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA6-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA6-1* 0.33))

           )

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

            (Parameter "Cloud top height")

                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)

            (Parameter "Aerosol radiative properties")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val5&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val2&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val3&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))

            (parameter "Aerosol species mole fraction")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Aerosol Radiative Forcing(C-2h)")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI3-2* (max ?*subobj-CLI3-2* 0.67))

            (value 0.75)
            (objective "Aerosol Radiative Forcing(C-2h)")

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI3-11-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Atmospheric temperature")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Lowest-3weeks-or-more) 0))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective CLI3-11)
            (parameter "Atmospheric temperature")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Aerosol Radiative Forcing(C-2h)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI3-11* (max ?*subobj-CLI3-11* 1.0))
)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI3-12)
            (parameter "Wind (vertical)")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Aerosol Radiative Forcing(C-2h)")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI3-12* (max ?*subobj-CLI3-12* 0.33))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI3-14-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Specific humidity")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6 Medium-200m-2km) 0))

            (parameter "Specific humidity")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Aerosol Radiative Forcing(C-2h)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI3-14* (max ?*subobj-CLI3-14* 1.0))
)

            (Parameter "Aerosol optical depth")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val5&~nil)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Accuracy ?val5 Medium) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI6-3)
            (parameter "Aerosol absorption optical depth")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Aerosol Properties and Distribution (C-5b)")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI6-3* (max ?*subobj-CLI6-3* 0.33))

                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))

            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Aerosol Properties and Distribution (C-5b)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI6-13)
            (parameter "Aerosol species mole fraction")
            (value 0.75)
            (objective "Aerosol Properties and Distribution (C-5b)")
            (attribute "Degraded horizontal resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI6-13* (max ?*subobj-CLI6-13* 0.75))
)

                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Lowest-100km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI8-3)
            (parameter "Precipitation")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Aerosol Cloud Changes and Radiative Fluxes (C-5d)")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI8-3* (max ?*subobj-CLI8-3* 0.67))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI9-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Land surface temperature")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val5&~nil)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Accuracy ?val5 Medium) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective CLI9-1)
            (parameter "Land surface temperature")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Atmospheric and Oceanic Circulation (C-7)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

            (objective "Atmospheric and Oceanic Circulation (C-7)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI11-6-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Sea surface salinity")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI13-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Aerosol optical depth")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val5&~nil)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Accuracy ?val5 Medium) 0))

    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective CLI13-1)
            (parameter "Aerosol optical depth")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Polar Region Aerosols (C-8g)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI13-1* (max ?*subobj-CLI13-1* 1.0))

            (Parameter "Aerosol optical depth")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy ?val5&~nil)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Accuracy ?val5 Medium) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI13-1)
            (parameter "Aerosol optical depth")
            (value 0.75)
            (objective "Polar Region Aerosols (C-8g)")
            (attribute "Lower vertical resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI13-1* (max ?*subobj-CLI13-1* 0.75))
)

                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI13-8)
            (parameter "Wind (vertical)")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Polar Region Aerosols (C-8g)")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI13-8* (max ?*subobj-CLI13-8* 0.33))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI13-10-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Specific humidity")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Lowest-3weeks-or-more) 0))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val6 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective CLI13-10)
            (parameter "Specific humidity")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Polar Region Aerosols (C-8g)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI13-10* (max ?*subobj-CLI13-10* 1.0))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI14-8-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Upward long-wave irradiance at TOA")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI14-18-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Sea-ice cover")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective CLI14-18)
            (parameter "Sea-ice cover")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "High-Latitude Low Clouds (C-8h)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI14-18* (max ?*subobj-CLI14-18* 1.0))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::ECO1-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Solar-induced fluorescence")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))

    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective ECO1-1)
            (parameter "Solar-induced fluorescence")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Fluxes within ecosystems (E-3a)")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ECO1-1* (max ?*subobj-ECO1-1* 1.0))

                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective ECO1-5)
            (parameter "Soil moisture (in the roots region)")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Fluxes within ecosystems (E-3a)")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ECO1-5* (max ?*subobj-ECO1-5* 0.33))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WAT1-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Downward short-wave irradiance at earth surface")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Very-high-1-12h) 0))

    (assert

            (parameter "Downward short-wave irradiance at earth surface")

            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WAT1-1* (max ?*subobj-WAT1-1* 1.0))
)

                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Cold-regions))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WAT3-2)
            (parameter "Earth surface albedo")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Snow Cover (H-1c)")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WAT3-2* (max ?*subobj-WAT3-2* 0.67))
)

                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ESI1-1* (max ?*subobj-ESI1-1* 1.0))

                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)

                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective ESI3-1)
            (parameter "Precipitation intensity at surface (liquid or solid)")
            (value 1.0)

            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ESI3-1* (max ?*subobj-ESI3-1* 1.0))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::ESI3-1-attribdegraded-1    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Precipitation intensity at surface (liquid or solid)")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Very-high-1-12h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective ESI3-1)
            (parameter "Precipitation intensity at surface (liquid or solid)")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Landscape Change due to Weather (S-4b)")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ESI3-1* (max ?*subobj-ESI3-1* 0.67))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::ESI3-1-attribdegraded-4    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "Precipitation intensity at surface (liquid or solid)")
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective ESI3-1)
            (parameter "Precipitation intensity at surface (liquid or solid)")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Landscape Change due to Weather (S-4b)")
            (attribute "Insufficient temporal resolution (&lt;once per day)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ESI3-1* (max ?*subobj-ESI3-1* 0.33))
